root.name: Wizardry: Labyrinth of Lost Souls
root.description: OverviewWizardry: The Labyrinth of Lost Souls is a PSN exclusive release from the prestigious Wizardry series of role playing games. It was released in the U.S. on June 1st, 2011 retailing at the price of $14.99.On July 19th, 2011, the DLC add-on "The Red Shadow of the Sister" was released on the US PSN store. This piece of content adds over 25 new monsters and over 15 new items, as well as new non-playable characters to the game. The add-on is available for download on the Playstation Network at the price of $7.99.Races ClassesLike in the old Wizardry games you have the option to create your character out of a list of races with base stats inherent to them. Choosing male or female does not effect the base starting values. After selecting your race you are given an amount of bonus points that you are free to assign however you want. The different classes have specific minimum requirements before they are available to create (both alignment and stat). If you do not get enough bonus points to create the class you want you are free to keep re-rolling until you get enough.Races of Wizardry LoLs:RaceStrIntPieVitAgiLucHuman888989Elf71010789Dwarf116101167Gnome51411559Porklu66561214Classes and Class Requirements:ClassAlignmentStrIntPieVitAgiLucFighterAny12N/AN/AN/AN/AN/AMageAnyN/A12N/AN/AN/AN/APriestGood, EvilN/AN/A12N/AN/AN/AThiefNeutral, EvilN/AN/AN/AN/A1012BishopGood, EvilN/A1313N/AN/AN/ASamuraiGood, Neutral15111014109LordGood151212151415NinjaEvil151515151515
